# Question One
## Assign x, a, and b.
```{r}
x <- 1.1
a <- 2.2
b <- 3.3
```
## Part a
```{r}
z <- x^a^b
print(z)
```
## Part b
```{r}
z <- (x^a)^b
print(z)
```
## Part c
```{r}
z<- 3*(x^3) + 2*(x^2) + 1
print(z)
```
